name: ABB C-E SERVICES, INC. and Gallagher Bassett Services, Inc., Petitioners, v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (RUSHING), Respondent
name_abbreviation: ABB C-E Services, Inc. v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: ABB C-E SERVICES, INC. and Gallagher Bassett Services, Inc., Petitioners, v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (RUSHING), Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of March 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED. Petitioners’ Application for Supersedeas is DISMISSED as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
968 A.2d 226
ABB C-E SERVICES, INC. and Gallagher Bassett Services, Inc., Petitioners, v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (RUSHING), Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 25, 2009.
